headline: Race for Ohio’s Senate seat: Mike Gibbons
sentences: CLEVELAND (WJW)– Mike Gibbons describes himself as a philosophical conservative, saying he wants to take his experiences as a self-made businessman to the U.S. Senate.
But the Republican Party is not about just Donald Trump, the Republican Party most carefully reflects my ideology which is, as I said philosophical conservatism.
And if Donald Trump runs and he’s the nominee, I’m going to support him the same way did the last two times.
We want to note FOX 8 News has reached out to and scheduled interviews with all the declared candidates.
Many in the field of Republican candidates are jockeying for support from former President Donald Trump.
See our interviews with JD Vance, Matt Dolan, Josh Mandel and Jane Timken here.
“I don’t know whether Donald Trump’s going to run again.
We are still waiting to hear back from Bernie Moreno.
I don’t care about an individual,” Gibbons said.
But, but we need to, I care about America.
That’s where we have to be.
